thread.title: markymarc

author: markymarc
title: markymarc
text: ...with my ECM Classika PID machine. This 'primarily espresso' machine fulfills my need for 2 to 3 doppio's daily. Based on my grind, tamp, bean choice, temperature setting and bar-pressure setting, I no longer have to visit the local coffee shops (a ...sniffle...). My annual cost avoidance / cost saving(s) are HUGE with this purchase. If in doubt about something, give them a call. Their friendly ego free advice is spot on.
